Comments_List: I gained a better understanding of the history of scientific experiments that have been done to provide understanding about cortical system organization and function

The strengths of this course are the comprehensive nature of the content, covering cortical systems from primary sensory up to complex higher order cognition and teaching students about those systems through experimental data, and including anatomy and species differences when relevant.

The weaknesses are the lack of clear communication about expectations and evaluations.
For those who would like to gain more understanding of anatomy and cortical function, I would recommend this course
